Resources

There are loads of great resources to learn nowadays. Here’s a list of sites that I’ve found useful.

Python

  • Learn Python The Hard Way If you already have programming experience this is a great way to see how things are done in Python.

C/C++

JavaScript

  • Eloquent JavaScript This book has a great introduction to not only JavaScript but numerous computer science topics.

Matlab

Physics
